Description:  Welding of various components as instructed by Foreman. Manual TIG welding experiences. Blending of various components as instructed by Foreman. Any other task requested and deemed necessary by management. Exercise due care and attention to avoid undue or unnecessary damage to components. Ensure that correct tools and equipment are available and used at all times – report any shortages or damage/wear to tools and equipment. Ensure compliance with QHSE policy & procedures.Skills
